column4: I'm buying a desktop for linux. I want to run Ubuntu, or maybe XUbubntu. I have pastebinned the specs of the two computers. which do you recomend? This PC would be mainly just for desktop stuff... The specs: http://pastebin.ca/346076  . Also, I need a wireless card. A PCI one. Which do you recomend?
personally I dont do AMD (no flaming please), so I vote for # 1
